Internal API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary

    ConnectionProxy
    Needs to be public to be used by ByteBuddy.

    Needs to be public to be used by ByteBuddy.

    Needs to be public to be used by ByteBuddy.
    EmbeddedDataSource
    A simple DataSource implementation that simply wraps a single Connection Needs to be public to be used by ByteBuddy.
